entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
